content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 units of iron ore. However, the stone furnace is currently in a "NO_INGREDIENTS" state, indicating that it is not processing any materials at the moment. 
# This is likely because I need to insert both coal for fuel and iron ore for smelting.

# Step 10: Refuel the furnace and insert iron ore
# I will insert coal into the furnace to ensure it has enough fuel, and then add the iron ore for smelting.

# Insert coal into the stone furnace
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Using 5 units of coal for fuel

# Insert iron ore into the stone furnace
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert the 10 units of iron ore

# Check the furnace state after inserting items
print(f"Furnace state after refueling and inserting materials: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")  # Check the furnace inventory
print(f"Final inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check my own inventory again
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Print state of entities on the map again
